attributes.additional_details: Because imperial time makes no sense and the numbers are too annoying. Analogue clocks are too complicated.
attributes.background:
New time system - 
10 months in a year
10 weeks in a month
10 days in a week
10 hours in a day
100 minutes in an hour
100 seconds in a minute

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for how people measure time.
